409.description: Current customer Id does not matched!

requestBody.description: NOTE: If parameters are omitted then all vehicle assignments will be return.

409.description: Vehicle Assignment Id does not matched!

requestBody.description: Vendor Id - NOTE: If vendor_id object is omitted then all users will be return.(For Admin Use Only)

409.description: User or Email address already exist!

Vehicle_ID.description: Unique ID number for the vehicle (e.g. truck number, plate number, * etc.). Remove in-between spaces. Field accepts alphanumeric only.

GPS.description: 1 - GPS tracker is online. 0 - GPS tracker is offline.

Ignition.description: 1 - Ignition is ON. 0 - Ignition is OFF

Latitude.description: Coordinate of the position data. Precision: 6 decimal places

Longitude.description: Coordinate of the position data. Precision: 6 decimal places

Altitude.description: Altitude in meters. Set to 0 if data unavailable.

Speed.description: Range from 0 to 999 in kilometer per hour.

Course.description: Angle of direction where vehicle is heading in degrees. Range from 0 to 359

Satellite_Count.description: Number of satellites detected by the tracker. if data unavailable, set to 4 satellites.

ADC1.description: Device battery in volts. Minimum value: 0

ADC2.description: Vehicle battery in volts. Minimum value: 0

RPM.description: Concrete mixer drum rounds per minute.
